title: Logan Paul Sells a Rare Pokémon Card for Millions
summary: Logan Paul, a famous YouTuber and wrestler, sold a very rare Pokémon card for $16.5 million, which is a new world record. He bought the card, called the Pikachu Illustrator, for $5.3 million in 2021. The card is special because it is one of only about 40 made in 1998 and is in perfect condition. The buyer is AJ Scaramucci, who wants to collect rare things like dinosaur fossils. The auction company, Goldin, helped with the sale, and Guinness World Records said it is the most expensive trading card ever sold. Pokémon cards have become very valuable recently, and this sale shows how popular they are.

background_read: Pokémon is a popular Japanese animation and game franchise that started in the 1990s. Trading cards based on Pokémon characters are collected by fans and can become very valuable over time. Auctions are events where people offer money to buy rare items, and records are set when something sells for more than ever before. Logan Paul is a social media star known for his videos and wrestling matches, and he often buys and sells expensive collectibles.
